For a fungal ITS barcoding project (ITS5-ITS4), 15 primer plates were assembled
using a dual-indexing strategy (see [primer_design](https://github.com/markschl/DadaNanoBC/tree/main/primer_design))
and the corresponding [example report](../primer-design-example.html).

With the MinION, more plates could easily be pooled in one run ([Hebert et al., 2024](https://doi.org/10.1111/1755-0998.14028)).
